replies.body: HI everyone, since I updated the client I can't get into a game. Any idea why that is ? If I press the button to start queueing, nothing happens. I also can't leave the lobby, only by pressing change game type. Every other function (for example buying riot points -.-) works perfectly fine. Bot game doesn't work either
Yeah, I'm having the exact same problem. I literally cannot play League of Legends because I cannot get into a game -  at all. {{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
Have this issue as well :/ Have you guys gotten a fix?

PLEASE HELP.....MY PATCH WAS DOWNLOADING AT AN INSANELY SLOW SPEED, ABOUT 15KB/S AND IT SHOULD BE 25MB/S.  FOLLOWED SOME ADVICE TO DELETE SOLUTIONS FOLDER, THEN REOPENED LEAGUE AND THEN IT TOLD ME TO REINSTALL.  I mean like wtf?  Everyone else said that worked for them.  ANYWAYS. now my friggin installer for the game is having same INSANELY slow DL speed. TElling me 4000+ mins and rising.  This has never been a thing for me before, I have always DLed patched and whatnot quickly.  Can anyone help?  I already lost my play time for the day which is HORRIBLE.  I get about 2 games a night before i have to sleep....this ruined my night.

> [{quoted}](name=Alchemy One,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=2pkh18jN,comment-id=0008,timestamp=2017-10-12T02:15:42.856+0000)
>
> PLEASE HELP.....MY PATCH WAS DOWNLOADING AT AN INSANELY SLOW SPEED, ABOUT 15KB/S AND IT SHOULD BE 25MB/S.  FOLLOWED SOME ADVICE TO DELETE SOLUTIONS FOLDER, THEN REOPENED LEAGUE AND THEN IT TOLD ME TO REINSTALL.  I mean like wtf?  Everyone else said that worked for them.  ANYWAYS. now my friggin installer for the game is having same INSANELY slow DL speed. TElling me 4000+ mins and rising.  This has never been a thing for me before, I have always DLed patched and whatnot quickly.  Can anyone help?  I already lost my play time for the day which is HORRIBLE.  I get about 2 games a night before i have to sleep....this ruined my night.

Im having the exact same issue... I have close to 100 mb/s download speed and my league is updating at lik 50 mb/s... tried reinstalling client and running patcher and neither worked.

I'm right here with you. Downloading at 400 kb/s with a 150 MB/s connection. And no it's not my firewall settings. Was gonna give league a try and spend some money on the sick new skins. Screw that. Can't even download the effing game. Riot being riot as per usual. A total joke
First
Second

Hi Riot,


I got a problem when i'm in the loading screen it seems that i can't go futher beyond that point 
like i'm stuck forever in the loading screen.
i never had any problems with this.


Yaz,

If you're still having this issue, I recommend running through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide.  It sounds like something is blocking your network from reaching the game server, but those steps should fix things up!

I had the same problem, then I uninstalled League Of Legends, tried to install again...and so I came to the common problems like other people here.
Impossible to download a client. Even from the Safe Mode on my laptop.

Maybe it was a problem side of riot 
i also received a warning leaver buster ...
kinda sad but i do understand why the system send me this warning but still not like i wanted to go afk for the team
since i got stuck in the loading screen  i tried to close client and log in again but i coudn't fix the problem even restart computer
after that it said i had no internet connection so i went to my internet browser and typed google and i just had internet.
wierd error by telling me  i don't have internet :*(  
my account is TwitchMade4death  

i'm going to make new account and i'm going to test if i can just play on my new account i let you guys know

cheers  Yaz,
I'm stuck in the endless loop of updating and reverting to old client. Have run in administrator, have used the Hextech repair tool, have rewinded the time, nothing has worked.

@Porocles something is wrong with the distribution on the patch.

Download speed has slowed to a crawl.
Cant use my emotes in game yet but all of my friends can for some reason.  The option to change the hotkey isnt in the options menu in game but it is in the client.{{sticker:sg-janna}}

Were you trying to do those emotes in a custom/practice game? I don't believe they work in those game modes yet for some reason, but let me know and we can troubleshoot if they weren't working in a normal game.
Having the same issue.

The update is fucking trash itself i had to freaking download the upate 2gb or whatever so 4 FUCKING TIMES DUO TO ''WE'VE BROUGHT YOUR CLIENT TO AN OLDER VERSION'' LIKE FOR GOD SAKES RIOTERS FIX THAT PLEASE ITS DRIVING ME FUCKING NUTS

Same. Did Riot do something to their servers or something? I played a few games yesterday before the frustrating "restored to a previous version" message popped up and my ping was insane. Disconnected a few times, when I hardly did before. What is going on with the servers?

Make sure you're launching the client as admin, and double check those steps in the [**permissions guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) if you need help getting that done. The client might not have permission from your OS without doing those steps, which might be why the update isn't being applied correctly.

If that doesn't help, go ahead and run a quick repair as well, since some of the files could be corrupted or just missing entirely.
i'm having ping issue after i update to 7.20 the ping stayed on 90 but before it's only 60 to70

Try updating a couple network settings like Port Forwarding and DNS configuration as well to make sure your network is able to get a clean signal with our servers still. If you aren't sure how to do those, hit up the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)!

i have the application installed but when i get onto the front page it says it still isn't fully downloaded. I figured out where it wasn't installed and it says it still needs to download 3417 mb (3.417 gb) but it stays there and doesn't progress any further. My internet works and it says to the side 2 MGps. can someone help me?

So hey guys, I was just wondering if you're ever so kindly to help me with this problem that I am having. So I've been trying to download league for the past couple days and every time the download hits 55% error 004 comes up. My patches won't load and no matter what I do the same error comes every time. I've reinstalled league twice, ran it as admin, had the game do a full repair but that doesn't seem to work as well cause the repair crashes half way. I've been doing everything I can but I can't seem to get it going. I would like it if you guys can help me out as I really want to get back onto the game and have a nice relaxation from studies! 

Thank you :)

I have a problem with the missions. The quest progress from my last 3 games didn't count. I even got a Double Kill, a rarity for someone of my poor skill...
EDIT: Restarting gave me some Worlds Points...and also removed all Missions. Is that supposed to happen?
It should count, but there were delays yesterday.  Everything should be okay now!

I played 3 games of ranked, won all 3, started at 0 LP, checked back after the three games won and I was still at 0 LP. I'm on NA, and when I got onto the league website to figure out what was going on it said it EUW was having issues with players not getting LP that they won. Is there any way I can get the LP I deserve? I can't play ranked until I get the points because I don't even know if the games will affect my placement at all, there's no point. I already sent in a ticket 4 hours ago and haven't gotten a response.

Got hit with the Direct X Error. {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} 
Anytime I try to load into a game after champion select I get a Direct X error and its impossible to play the game, luckily Im not on leaver buster and trying to load into tutorial matches to figure out a way to fix the error. 
Any creative work arounds? 
note: deleting the config file isn't working this time.  
hopefully the comment section serves as a device to help anyone else effected by this issue.
After I reinstalled League, my League folder is missing lol.launcher.exe and lol.launcher.admin.exe. Can someone send me those files for patch 7.20?

On this patch, certain animations aren't synced with theyre hit box by a lot. Jinx ult and Ornn Ult are two that come to mind. I see the rocket pass through the enemy and about 1.5 seconds later I see the dmg and explosion animation, same with ornn on hitting his ult redirect. I'm also getting really weird animation effects with Xayah Q where the feathers seem to come from out of nowhere and land where they're support. Same with azir soldiers. I can't reproduce in replays, it's only in game. I'm running a Nvidia 980Ti on Windows 10 Pro.

I keep getting the "we have restored to a previous version" error message. It then says I need to restart, and when I do, just loops back to the "we have restored to a previous version". It's immensely frustrating. I've used the Repair Tool to try force repatch but it just has the same problem over and over again. Any solutions?
{{summoner:32}}

unable to login maybe offline  , tried this (https://boards.euw.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support-en/0ozOAbUG-known-issue-were-unable-to-log-you-in-because-you-may-be-offline) did not work,dns flush ,hexatech,re patch .nothing works . Help !


{{item:3070}}

It sounds like something is blocking you from reaching the authentication server, I also recommend double checking your anti-virus and firewall.  You can download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to auto-configure your firewall settings just in case.  

Should that fail, grab the logs provided by the HRT and submit them in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can look into this with you directly.

My frame rates have been consistently low because of this patch. It seems that turning the graphics settings way down does not do anything to solve the problem. I would typically have 60 on high settings. Moving the camera in unlocked mode makes the frames drop. V-Sync makes the problem much worse. The client is not being run on integrated graphics but the 930m that came with my laptop.  I have not encountered this problem before.

I haven't played for around a year (maybe more :/), So I just got the new client, and it was going good, I could do everything just fine, I got into a game and was about to play when I got a error, saying "An unknown DirectX error has occured and League of Legends cannot start. Please make sure your video card is using the latest video drivers from the manufacturer." I think this was the issue a few months ago, but none of the solutions have helped. I have a PC running on windows 7. Do I need to be on Windows 10? Cause that would suck :(

You can still play on Windows 7, so let's first make sure that you've got the DirectX driver updates first then double check for any graphics driver updates. Check out the other steps in the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) if those updates don't help!
I had this issue as well and I insured my drivers were up to date and I tried all the steps in the FPS guide.  Is there anything else I can do?

I have been having an login error that has just begun this morning. My setting for things such as map size, HUD size, etc is all getting erased every time I login in and out of my account. I have done a full repair about 3 times to try to solve this issue but nothing is working. Please help!
This was due to an issue with persisted settings being turned off for a short period of time. After they were enabled again you shouldn't have that problem anymore!

HELLO PLZ HELPPP!!! even since the 7.20 patch, I haven't been able to open the client. Whenever I open it, the league of legends logo and a grey loading bar pops up in the middle of the screen as a window. But i assume the grey bar is a loading bar for the update or opening the client. The problem is that it never loads at all. btw I'm using a mac and before the 7.20 patch, it was working just fine. plz help I wanna play again.

Sounds like your Mac doesn't have the proper admin settings set up so that League can access the files it needs to launch. Give [**these steps**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664#mq9) a try, and you should be able to get the client running again.

Hey thanks for the help, but i have tried the steps as well as restarting and it still seems to do the same thing. Would the problem be related to the current mac OS? Is there any other solution to this problem?

Basically low spec mode was already on but i'm still way too laggy to play any ranked games or any normal games for that matter, hope you can help. (the problem came with the recently update, I haven't had the problem before)

Low-Spec mode will only help reduce some of the load on your pc so the game will run smoother, it doesn't help improve your network connection. Let's try adjusting your port forwarding and DNS settings with the steps in the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to see if that reduces some of that lag.

I don't get any ip and got stuck to 9512, did my daily it showed I earned 176 ip but I didn't get em then won a draft earned 86 ip and same issue , did an aram and same again still 9512. Anyone else is experiencing this issue?

Edit: Nvm once the store came back online I got my iP
Glad to hear everything is okay now!
what about my black screen issue.. come on porocles?..

anyone having this black screen issue after downloading the new client? i can hear sounds but i cannot see shit.. i have 3 monitors on my computer my main monitor is a predator monitor 2k resolution. i just came back after 2 years of not playing league and i encounter a bug for the same reason i left 2 years ago.. i'm done.. with this. cya later guys, good think overwatch runs smoothly and dota 2 will someday overpass league.
